Meta.title: Variable Sprite Support
Meta.author: DK
Meta.description:
[h1]Variable Sprite Support (formerly High Res Sprite Fix)[/h1]
Allows the usage of variable resolutions and ratios of PCC sprites and accordingly fit them onto the PCC.
[h1]Parts[/h1]
[img=https://i.postimg.cc/Y9YcFhnf/demo.jpg]
Mod authors can now create PCC parts with sprites other than 32x48.
[h1]Body[/h1]
Body asset must be in the ratio of 2:3 still, the resolution doesn't matter.
[h1]Credits[/h1] Mirkhan for the idea and help with testing. noa for not setting all textures on GPU side so I don't have to copy & blit
[url=https://github.com/gottyduke/Elin.Plugins/tree/master/VariableSpriteSupport]sauce[/url]
